entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who has a grudge against Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who mentions Draco Malfoy instantly.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: The person who hates Harry and is the son of Lucius Malfoy.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Draco's father who was a big supporter of You Know Who.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Harry's friend who asks if Draco Malfoy is Lucius Malfoy's son.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Harry's friend who mentions that his dad thinks Lucius Malfoy was in You Know Who's inner circle.

entities.name: dudley dursley
entities.description: A boy who is compared to Draco Malfoy by Harry.

entities.name: you know who
entities.description: The person or entity that Lucius Malfoy supported.

entities.name: dad
entities.description: Fred's father who thinks Lucius Malfoy was in You Know Who's inner circle.

relationships.description: Harry has a grudge against Draco Malfoy, as mentioned by Harry himself.
George knows that Lucius Malfoy is Draco's father.
Fred's dad thinks that Lucius Malfoy was in You Know Who's inner circle.
Lucius Malfoy supported You Know Who, as mentioned by Fred's dad.
